00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 // Name: Init()
00038 // Desc: Query audio devices
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 Result WaveformAudio::Init()
00041 {
00042         // Query output devices
00043         WAVEOUTCAPS wocaps;
00044 
00045         numoutdevs = waveOutGetNumDevs();
00046         if(numoutdevs == 0)
00047                 return ERR("No MME audio output devices found"); //EDIT: Log, don't fail
00048         numoutdevs++; // Add wave mapper device
00049 
00050         // Get output device names
00051         CHKALLOC(outdevnames = new String[numoutdevs]);
00052         outdevnames[0] = String(WAVEMAPPERNAME);
00053         for(UINT i = 0; i < numoutdevs; i++)
00054         {
00055                 waveOutGetDevCaps(i, &wocaps, sizeof(wocaps));
00056                 outdevnames[i] = String(wocaps.szPname);
00057         }
00058 
00059         // Query input devices
00060         WAVEINCAPS wicaps;
00061 
00062         numindevs = waveInGetNumDevs();
00063         if(numindevs == 0)
00064                 return ERR("No MME audio input devices found"); //EDIT: Log, don't fail
00065         numindevs++; // Add wave mapper device
00066 
00067         // Get input device names
00068         CHKALLOC(indevnames = new String[numindevs]);
00069         indevnames[0] = String(WAVEMAPPERNAME);
00070         for(UINT i = 0; i < numindevs; i++)
00071         {
00072                 waveInGetDevCaps(i, &wicaps, sizeof(wicaps));
00073                 indevnames[i] = String(wocaps.szPname);
00074         }
00075 
00076         return R_OK;
00077 }

00079 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 // Name: GetSupportedOutputFormats()
00081 // Desc: Get available sample rates, channels and bits per sample
00082 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 Result WaveformAudio::GetSupportedOutputFormats(UINT deviceid, AudioFormat** formats)
00084 {
00085         if(deviceid >= numoutdevs)
00086                 return ERR("Invalid device id");
00087         REMAPDEVCEID(deviceid); // Wave mapper acts as the first device
00088 
00089         WAVEOUTCAPS wocaps;
00090         waveOutGetDevCaps(deviceid, &wocaps, sizeof(wocaps));
00091 
00092         CHKALLOC(*formats = new AudioFormat[20]);
00093         UINT fmtidx = 0;
00094 
00095         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_1M08)
00096                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(11025, 1, 8);
00097         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_1S08)
00098                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(11025, 2, 8);
00099         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_1M16)
00100                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(11025, 1, 16);
00101         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_1S16)
00102                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(11025, 2, 16);
00103         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_2M08)
00104                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(22050, 1, 8);
00105         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_2S08)
00106                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(22050, 2, 8);
00107         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_2M16)
00108                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(22050, 1, 16);
00109         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_2S16)
00110                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(22050, 2, 16);
00111         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_44M08)
00112                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(44100, 1, 8);
00113         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_44S08)
00114                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(44100, 2, 8);
00115         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_44M16)
00116                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(44100, 1, 16);
00117         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_44S16)
00118                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(44100, 2, 16);
00119         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_48M08)
00120                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(48000, 1, 8);
00121         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_48S08)
00122                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(48000, 2, 8);
00123         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_48M16)
00124                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(48000, 1, 16);
00125         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_48S16)
00126                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(48000, 2, 16);
00127         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_96M08)
00128                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(96000, 1, 8);
00129         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_96S08)
00130                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(96000, 2, 8);
00131         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_96M16)
00132                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(96000, 1, 16);
00133         if(wocaps.dwFormats & WAVE_FORMAT_96S16)
00134                 (*formats)[fmtidx++] = AudioFormat(96000, 2, 16);
00135 
00136         CHKALLOC(*formats = (AudioFormat*)realloc(*formats, fmtidx * sizeof(AudioFormat)));
00137 
00138         return R_OK;
00139 }
